schema.title:
按流量转发所使用的阿里云网络资源类型进行分析，枚举如下：
AccessInternetIPV4：所有阿里云公网类型IPV4。
AccessInternetIPV4Limited：所有受地域限速的阿里云公网类型IPV4。
ElasticIP: 弹性公网EIP（IPV4）。
PublicIpEcs:  绑定在ECS的固定公网IP（IPV4）。
PublicIpClb:  绑定在CLB的固定公网IP（IPV4）。
GA：全球加速。
NAT：通过SNAT的访问公网流量。
TR：流经云企业网转发路由器的流量。
TRAttachment：流经云企业网连接实例的流量，包括地域内连接和跨地域连接。
VBR：流经边界路由器的流量。
GA：流经全球加速的流量。
ECR：流经ECR的流量。
VPC：流经VPC的流量。
InternetProbing: 公网探测数据。
IntranetProbing: 内网探测数据。

基于阿里云资源的网络流量方向：
in：流入资源的流量方向。
out：流出资源的流量方向。
跨域流量分析因只采集出向流量，所以传入in也以out处理。
地域内性能观测和地域间性能观测因需在Filter内指定源或目的，所以可以任意指定Direction。

指定指标排名的维度，通用枚举如下：
 Tuple1：表示一元组，按资源端IP粒度聚合流量进行分析。
 Tuple2：表示二元组，按流的源目IP聚合进行分析。
 Tuple5：表示五元组，按流的源目IP、端口和协议进行分析。
 Protocol: 按协议类型维度进行聚合分析。
 SourcePort: 按源端口维度进行聚合分析。
 DestinationPort: 按目的端口维度进行聚合分析。
 InstanceId：按云上实例ID进行聚合分析。
在公网流量分析场景，支持按互联网位置分布进行聚合排序，枚举值有：
 IpPair：按源和目的IP进行聚合分析。
 Country：按客户端国家维度进行聚合分析。
 City：按客户端城市维度进行聚合分析。
 ISP：按客户端运营商维度进行聚合分析。
 ASN：按客户端运营商ASN维度进行聚合分析。
 CityASN：按客户端城市和运营商维度进行聚合分析。
在跨域流量分析场景，支持的枚举有：
 RegionPair：按云企业网联通的两端Region进行聚合分析。
在NAT流量分析场景，支持的枚举有：
 IP：按ECS私网IP维度聚合分析。
在公网探测场景，支持的枚举有：
 CountryIsp：按探测国家和探测运营商进行聚合分析。
 Province：按探测省份进行聚合分析。
 ProvinceIsp:按探测省份和探测运营商进行聚合分析。
在云上内网探测场景，支持的枚举有：
 RegionPair：按探测地域对进行聚合分析。
 ZonePair：按某个地域内可用区对进行聚合分析。

指定公网流量进行排名的指标。大小写敏感。
  bps：每秒比特数。
  pps：每秒包数。
  ByteCount：累计字节数。
  PacketCount：累计包数。
公网场景特有参数：
  rtt：tcp协议建立连接时的往返延迟。
  RetransmitRate：重传率。
区域级限速场景特有参数：
  RatelimitDropPps：限速丢包速率。
NAT场景特有参数：
  ActiveSessionCount：并发会话数。
  NewSessionPerSecond：每秒新建会话数。
支持进一步指定流量的过滤条件，进行聚焦性流量分析。
起始时间戳，单位毫秒。未指定时默认查最近1小时。
结束时间戳，单位毫秒。未指定时默认查最近1小时。只指定了BeginTime时查BeginTime之后的1小时。

排序方式，
asc：按正序排序。
desc：按逆序排序。
展示排序靠前的数据。默认值：10。表示默认展示排序前 10 的数据。最大值：100。
是否使用多账号访问模式
RpcResponse<ArrayList<PublicFlowlogMetricModel>>
schema.description: RpcResponse<ArrayList<PublicFlowlogMetricModel>>

InstanceId.title: 各场景下表示对应的云上资源实例ID，如跨域流量分析场景表示CenID，公网场景表示EipId、EcsId、ClbId等。

Asn.title: 客户端运营商的自治系统编号。

400.errorMessage: It only supports querying data for up to 24 hours: %s.
Too much data has been queried under the specified conditions. Shorten the query time, specify more precise filtering conditions, or try again later.
The specified param of orderBy (%s) is invalid.
The specified resourceType (%s) is invalid.
The specified param of GroupBy (%s) is invalid.
The specified direction (%s) is invalid.
The specified InstanceId(%s) is illegal.
It only supports querying data for up to 5 minute when TupleType is 5 and the CloudIp and OtherIp are both empty: %s.

404.errorMessage: The specified InstanceId(%s) does not exist.
The specified instance does not exist or does not have any acceleration region.

GetInternetTuple.summary: Queries the rankings of Internet traffic data in the form of 1-tuple, 2-tuple, or 5-tuple. Internet traffic data can be ranked by metrics such as traffic volumes and the number of packets.

schema.description: The ID of the region for which you want to query the Internet traffic.

schema.title: 查询的元组类型，枚举：1，2，5，分别表示一元组、二元组、五元组
schema.description:
The type of the tuple. Valid values:

*   **1**: 1-tuple
*   **2**: 2-tuple
*   **5**: 5-tuple

schema.title: 查询起始时间的毫秒时间戳。
schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

schema.title: 查询结束时间的毫秒时间戳。
schema.description: The end of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

schema.title:
查询流量方向，取值：
in：入云方向
out：出云方向
schema.description:
The direction of the Internet traffic that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **in**: inbound
*   **out**: outbound

schema.title: 根据什么指标排序，默认值为ByteCount，即按流量排序。
schema.description:
The metric for data ranking. Default value: **ByteCount**. This value indicates that Internet traffic data is ranked by traffic volume.

Valid values:

*   Rtt
*   ByteCount
*   PacketCount
*   RetransmitRate

schema.title: 五元组：云端IP。
schema.description: The local IP address.

schema.title: 五元组：云端端口
schema.description:
The local port.

>  This parameter is required only if you set GroupBy to CloudPort.

schema.title: 五元组：对端IP
schema.description:
The remote IP address.

> This parameter is required only when you set **TupleType** to **2** or **5**.

schema.title: 五元组：对端端口
schema.description:
The remote port.

> This parameter is required only when you set **TupleType** to **5**.

schema.title: 实例Id
schema.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud instance.

schema.title: 五元组：协议
schema.description:
The protocol number.

> All protocols are supported. This parameter is required only when you set **TupleType** to **5**.

schema.title: 排序方向：desc从大到小排序，asc从小到大排序。
schema.description:
The order in which instances are ranked by Internet traffic. Valid values:

*   **desc**: the descending order
*   **asc**: the ascending order

schema.title: 默认10
schema.description: Specifies top-N traffic data to display. Default value: **10**. This value specifies to display top-10 traffic data by default. Max value: **100**.

schema.title: 云端运营商。
schema.description:
The local Internet service provider (ISP).

>  In most cases, the value is Alibaba or Alibaba Cloud.

schema.title: 对端运营商，查看运营商情况时，请指定此参数。
schema.description:
The remote ISP.

> This parameter is required if you want to view the information about the remote ISP.

schema.title: 对端国家。仅TupleType配置为5时，才需要配置该参数。
schema.description:
The remote country.

>  This parameter is required only if you set **TupleType** to **2** or **5**.

schema.title: 对端城市。仅TupleType配置为5时，才需要配置该参数。
schema.description:
The remote city.

>  This parameter is required only if you set **TupleType** to **2** or **5**.
The instance IDs for filtering.
The local IP addresses for filtering.

items.description: The local IP address for filtering.

schema.title: 是否使用多账号访问模式
schema.description:
Specifies whether to enable the multi-account management feature. Default value: **false**. This value specifies that the multi-account management feature is disabled.

>  By default, the multi-account management feature is not available. If you want to use this feature, contact your account manager to apply for permissions.

schema.title: 显式传递子账号ID
schema.description: The IDs of member accounts.

items.description: The ID of the member account.

schema.title: RpcResponse<ArrayList<PublicFlowTupleModel>>
schema.description: The response parameters.

Data.description: The ranking result of Internet traffic data.

items.description: The ranking result of instances by Internet traffic.

BeginTime.title: 数据时间点
BeginTime.description: The beginning of the time range that you queried. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

Direction.title: 数据方向
Direction.description:
The direction of Internet traffic. Valid values:

*   **in**: inbound
*   **out**: outbound

InstanceId.title: 阿里侧IP归属的实例。
InstanceId.description: The ID of the instance to which the local IP address belongs.

AccessRegion.title: InstanceId为AnyCastEip时，流量进入阿里云的Pop点。
AccessRegion.description:
The access point of Alibaba Cloud.

>  This parameter is valid only if you set **InstanceId** to the instance ID of an Anycast elastic IP address (EIP).

CloudProduct.title: 云端ISP
CloudProduct.description: The service code of the instance to which the local IP address belongs.

OtherProvince.title: 对端省份
OtherProvince.description: The remote province. In most cases, this parameter is empty if you set **OtherCountry** to a country except China.

OtherCity.title: 对端城市
OtherCity.description: The remote city. In most cases, this parameter is empty if you set **OtherCountry** to a country except China.

OtherProduct.title: 对端ISP
OtherProduct.description: The service code of the instance to which the remote IP address belongs. If the IP address is not on the cloud, this parameter is empty.

InByteCount.title: 包数指标(个)
InByteCount.description: The inbound traffic volume. Unit: bytes.

OutByteCount.title: 包数指标(个)
OutByteCount.description: The outbound traffic volume. Unit: bytes.

InOutOrderCount.title: 入方向乱序包数指标(个)
InOutOrderCount.description: The number of inbound disordered packets.

OutOutOrderCount.title: 出方向乱序包数指标(个)
OutOutOrderCount.description: The number of outbound disordered packets.

InRetranCount.title: 入方向重传包数指标(个)
InRetranCount.description: The number of inbound repeated packets.

OutRetranCount.title: 出方向重传包数指标(个)
OutRetranCount.description: The number of outbound repeated packets.

RetransmitRate.title: 重传率。
RetransmitRate.description: The retransmission rate of TCP packets.

400.errorMessage: The TopN(%s) should not greater than 100.
It only supports querying data for up to 1 hour: %s.
The specified param of GroupBy (%s) is invalid.
The specified param of orderBy (%s) is invalid.
The specified region ID (%s) is invalid.
It only supports querying data for up to 24 hours: %s.
It only supports querying data for up to 5 minute when TupleType is 5 and the CloudIp and OtherIp are both empty: %s.
The operation failed due to too many concurrent queries. Please try again later.
Too much data has been queried under the specified conditions. Shorten the query time, specify more precise filtering conditions, or try again later.

404.errorMessage: The specified InstanceId(%s) does not exist.
The specified instance does not exist or does not have any acceleration region.

GetInternetTuple.title: GetInternetTuple

GetNatTopN.summary: Queries the real-time SNAT performance ranking of a NAT gateway.

schema.title: Nat网关实例所属地域
schema.description: The ID of the region in which the NAT gateway is deployed.

schema.title: Nat网关实例ID
schema.description: The ID of the NAT gateway.

schema.title: 查询指标的开始毫秒时间戳。如果不指定EndTime，则查询的是BeginTime指定的时间点的TopN情况。
schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query in milliseconds. If you do not specify **EndTime**, the point in time specified by **BeginTime** is queried.

schema.title: 查询指标的结束毫秒时间戳。BeginTime和EndTime的最大差距不能超过24小时，即86400000。
schema.description: The end of the time range to query in milliseconds. The time range specified by **BeginTime** and **EndTime** cannot exceed **86400000** milliseconds (24 hours).

schema.title: 按哪个指标倒叙排序取TopN。
schema.description:
The metric that is used for real-time SNAT performance ranking. Valid values:

*   **InBps**: inbound data transfer. Unit: bit/s.
*   **OutBps**: outbound data transfer. Unit: bit/s.
*   **InPps**: inbound packet forwarding rate. Unit: packets per second.
*   **OutPps**: outbound packet forwarding rate. Unit: packets per second.
*   **NewSessionPerSecond**: new connection creation rate. Unit: connections per second.
*   **ActiveSessionCount**: number of concurrent connections. Unit: connections.

schema.title: 取最大多少条数据，默认10，最大100。
schema.description: The number of entries to return for real-time SNAT performance ranking. Valid values: **1 to 100**. Default value: **10**.

schema.title: 查指定ip的指标，此时无需传topN和orderBy
schema.description: Query ranking statistics for a specific IP address. If you specify this parameter, you do not need to specify **TopN** or **OrderBy**.

NatGatewayTopN.title: 以下指标取BeginTime到EndTime的均值。
NatGatewayTopN.description: An array of statistics about real-time SNAT performance ranking.

items.description: The fields that are included in the statistics about real-time SNAT performance ranking. The values of the fields are averages within the time range from **BeginTime** to **EndTime**.

InBps.title: 入方向流量，单位bps
InBps.description: The inbound data transfer. Unit: bit/s.

OutBps.title: 出方向流量，单位bps
OutBps.description: The outbound data transfer. Unit: bit/s.

InPps.title: 入方向包速率（个/秒）
InPps.description: The inbound packet forwarding rate. Unit: packets per second.

OutPps.title: 出方向包速率
OutPps.description: The outbound packet forwarding rate. Unit: packets per second.

InFlowPerMinute.description: This field is reserved and not in use.

OutFlowPerMinute.description: This field is reserved and not in use.

NewSessionPerSecond.title: 新建连接数（个/秒）
NewSessionPerSecond.description: The new connection creation rate. Unit: connections per second.

ActiveSessionCount.title: 并发连接数（个）
ActiveSessionCount.description: The number of concurrent connections. Unit: connections.

IsTopNOpen.title: 该实例是否开通TopN功能
IsTopNOpen.description:
Indicates whether Network Intelligence Service (NIS) is activated. The NatGatewayTopN parameter returns an empty array when NIS is not activated.

*   **true**: activated
*   **false**: not activated

400.errorMessage: The TopN(%s) should not greater than 100.
It only supports querying data for up to 7 days: %s.
The specified resourceId (%s) may be not exist.
The specified param of orderBy (%s) is invalid.

GetNatTopN.title: GetNatTopN

GetVbrFlowTopN.summary: Queries the rankings of hybrid cloud traffic data in the form of 1-tuple, 2-tuple, or 5-tuple. Hybrid cloud traffic data can be ranked by metrics such as traffic volumes and the number of packets.

schema.title: 云端地域。
schema.description: The local region.

schema.title: 查询起始时间的毫秒时间戳。最大支持查24小时跨度的数据。
schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC. The maximum time range that you can query is 24 hours.

schema.title: 查询结束时间的毫秒时间戳。最大支持查24小时跨度的数据。
schema.description: The end of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC. The maximum time range that you can query is 24 hours.

schema.title:
对于当前地域或IP的流量方向。
in：从IDC访问阿里云
out：从阿里云访问IDC
schema.description:
The direction of the hybrid cloud traffic in the local regions or for the local IP addresses. Valid values:

*   **in**: traffic from a data center to Alibaba Cloud
*   **out**: traffic from Alibaba Cloud to a data center

schema.title:
指定混合云流量排名的维度，大小写敏感。
1Tuple：查询混合云流量中CEN、连接、VBR、IP维度的排名。
2Tuple：查询混合云流量中两端IP维度的排名。
5Tuple：查询混合云流量中两端IP、两端端口和协议维度的排名。
CloudPort：查询混合云流量中云端端口的排名。
OtherPort：查询混合云流量中IDC端端口的排名。
Protocol：查询混合云流量中协议维度的排名。
schema.description:
The dimension for ranking hybrid cloud traffic data. The value of this parameter is case-sensitive. Valid values:

*   **1Tuple**: queries the rankings of hybrid cloud traffic data for the Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instances, CEN connections, virtual border routers (VBRs), and IP addresses.
*   **2Tuple**: queries the rankings of hybrid cloud traffic data for the local and remote IP addresses.
*   **5Tuple**: queries the rankings of hybrid cloud traffic data for the local and remote IP addresses, local and remote ports, and protocols.
*   **CloudPort**: queries the rankings of hybrid cloud traffic data for the local ports.
*   **OtherPort**: queries the rankings of hybrid cloud traffic data for the remote ports.
*   **Protocol**: queries the rankings of hybrid cloud traffic data for the protocols.

schema.title: 按哪个指标倒序排序
schema.description: The metric for ranking hybrid cloud traffic data. Default value: Bytes. This value specifies that hybrid cloud traffic data is ranked by traffic volumes.

schema.title:
排序方式。
desc：降序
asc：升序
schema.description:
The order for ranking hybrid cloud traffic data. Valid values:

*   **desc**: descending order
*   **asc**: ascending order

schema.title: 取最大多少条数据，默认10，最大100。
schema.description: Specifies top-N traffic data to display. Default value: **10**. This value specifies that top-10 traffic data is displayed by default. Maximum value: **100**.

schema.title: CEN实例ID。
schema.description: The CEN instance ID.

schema.title: 专线ID。
schema.description: The ID of the VBR that is associated with the Express Connect circuit.

schema.title: CEN的连接ID。
schema.description: The CEN connection ID.

schema.title:
协议类型编号。常见协议号如下：
1：ICMP
4：IP
6：TCP
17：UDP
41：IPv6
schema.description:
The protocol number.

>  All protocols are supported. This parameter is required only if you set **GroupBy** to **5Tuple** or **Protocol**.

schema.title: 云端IP
schema.description: The local IP address.

schema.title: IDC侧IP
schema.description: The remote IP address.

schema.title: 云端端口号
schema.description:
The local port.

>  This parameter is required only if you set **GroupBy** to **CloudPort**.

schema.title: IDC侧端口号
schema.description:
The remote port.

>  This parameter is required only if you set **GroupBy** to **OtherPort**.

schema.title: 子账号ID
schema.description: The IDs of member accounts.

items.description: The ID of the member account.

schema.description:
Specifies whether to enable the multi-account management feature. Default value: **false**. This value specifies that the multi-account management feature is disabled.

>  By default, the multi-account management feature is not available. If you want to use this feature, contact your account manager to apply for permissions.

schema.title: RpcResponse<VbrFlowlogTopNResponse>
schema.description: The response parameters.

VirtualBorderRouterFlowlogTopN.description: The ranking result of hybrid cloud traffic data.

CloudRegion.title: region
CloudRegion.description: The local region where the local IP address resides.

VirtualBorderRouterId.title: 专线Id
VirtualBorderRouterId.description: The ID of the VBR that is associated with the Express Connect circuit.

Bytes.description: The total volume of traffic in the specified time range.

Packets.description: The total number of packets in the specified time range.

400.errorMessage: The TopN(%s) should not greater than 100.
The specified begin time (%s) is invalid.
It only supports querying data for up to 7 days: %s.
The specified Sort(%s) is invalid.
The specified param of orderBy (%s) is invalid.
Too much data has been queried under the specified conditions. Shorten the query time, specify more precise filtering conditions, or try again later.
The specified region ID (%s) is invalid.

GetVbrFlowTopN.title: GetVbrFlowTopN

GetTransitRouterFlowTopN.summary: Queries the rankings of inter-region traffic data in the form of 1-tuple, 2-tuple, or 5-tuple. Inter-region traffic data can be ranked by metrics such as traffic volumes and the number of packets.

schema.title: 查询起始时间的毫秒时间戳。最大支持查24小时跨度的数据。
schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC. The maximum time range that you can query is 24 hours.

schema.title: 查询结束时间的毫秒时间戳。最大支持查24小时跨度的数据。
schema.description: The end of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC. The maximum time range that you can query is 24 hours.

schema.title: 取最大多少条数据，默认10，最大100。
schema.description: Specifies the maximum number of data entries to display. Default value: **10**. Maximum value: 100.

schema.title:
对于当前地域或IP的流量方向。
in：入流量 
out：出流量
schema.description:
The direction of the inter-region traffic in the local regions or for the local IP addresses. Valid values:

*   **in**: inbound traffic
*   **out**: outbound traffic

schema.title:
指定跨域流量排名的维度，大小写敏感。
1Tuple：查询跨域流量中当前地域、CEN、IP维度的排名。
2Tuple：查询跨域流量中两端地域、两端IP对维度的排名。
5Tuple：查询跨域流量中两端IP、两端端口和协议维度的排名。
Cen：查询跨域流量中CEN实例维度的排名。
RegionPair：查询跨域流量中两端地域维度的排名。
Port：查询跨域流量中端口维度的排名。
Protocol：查询跨域流量中协议维度的排名。
schema.description:
The dimension for ranking inter-region traffic data. The value of this parameter is case-sensitive. Valid values:

*   **1Tuple**: queries the rankings of inter-region traffic data for the local regions, Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instances, and IP addresses.
*   **2Tuple**: queries the rankings of inter-region traffic data for the local and remote regions, and the local and remote IP addresses.
*   **5Tuple**: queries the rankings of inter-region traffic data for the local and remote IP addresses, local and remote ports, and protocols.
*   **Cen**: queries the rankings of inter-region traffic data for CEN instances.
*   **RegionPair**: queries the rankings of inter-region traffic data for the local and remote regions.
*   **Port**: queries the rankings of inter-region traffic data for the local and remote ports.
*   **Protocol**: queries the rankings of inter-region traffic data for the protocols.

schema.title: 当前地域。
schema.description: The local region where the **local IP address** resides.

schema.title: 当前IP地址。
schema.description: The local IP address.

schema.title: 当前端口。
schema.description: The local port.

schema.title: 对端地域。
schema.description: The remote region.

schema.title: 对端IP地址。
schema.description: The remote IP address.

schema.title: 对端端口。
schema.description: The remote port.

schema.title:
协议类型编号。常见协议号如下：
1：ICMP
4：IP
6：TCP
17：UDP
41：IPv6
schema.description:
The protocol number.

>  All protocols are supported. This parameter is required only if you set **GroupBy** to **5Tuple** or **Protocol**.

schema.title: 按哪个指标排序。
schema.description: The metric for ranking inter-region traffic data. Default value: Bytes. This value specifies that inter-region traffic data is ranked by traffic volume.

schema.title:
排序方式。
desc：降序
asc：升序
schema.description:
The order for ranking inter-region traffic data. Valid values:

*   **desc**: descending order
*   **asc**: ascending order

schema.title: CEN实例ID。
schema.description: The CEN instance ID.

schema.title: CEN带宽包ID。
schema.description: The ID of the CEN bandwidth plan.

items.description: The ID of the member account.

schema.description:
Specifies whether to enable the multi-account management feature. Default value: **false**. This value specifies that the multi-account management feature is disabled.

>  By default, the multi-account management feature is not available. If you want to use this feature, contact your account manager to apply for permissions.

Packets.description: The total number of packets in the specified time range.

Bytes.description: The total volume of traffic in the specified time range.

CreateNetworkReachableAnalysis.summary: Creates a task for analyzing network reachability.

schema.description: The ID of the region for which you want to create a task for analyzing network reachability.
The ID of the network path. You can call the [CreateNetworkPath](~~2366522~~) operation to obtain the ID of the network path.
The tags to add to the resource.

Key.description:
The key of the tag to add to the resource. The tag key can be up to 128 characters in length and cannot contain `http://` or `https://`. The tag key cannot start with `acs:` or `aliyun`.

You can add up to 20 tags in each call.

Value.description:
The value of the tag to add to the resource. The tag value can be up to 128 characters in length and cannot contain `http://` or `https://`. The tag value cannot start with `acs:` or `aliyun`. The tag value can be an empty string.

You can add up to 20 tag values in each call.

NetworkReachableAnalysisId.description: The ID of the task for analyzing network reachability.

CreateNetworkReachableAnalysis.title: CreateNetworkReachableAnalysis
CreateNetworkReachableAnalysis.description:
*   The **CreateNetworkReachableAnalysis** operation is used to create a task for analyzing the reachability of the network path that is created by calling the **CreateNetworkPath** operation and record the analysis results.
*   The **CreateNetworkReachableAnalysis** operation can be called to repeatedly analyze the reachability of a network path.
*   You can create up to 1,000 reachability analysis records within one Alibaba Cloud account.

CreateNetworkPath.summary: Creates a network path for reachability analysis.

schema.description: The region ID of the network path that you want to create.
The name of the network path.
The ID of the source resource.

The type of the source resource. Valid values:

*   **ecs**: the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance
*   **internetIp**: the public IP address
*   **vsw**: the vSwitch
*   **vpn**: the VPN gateway
*   **vbr**: the virtual border router (VBR)
The source IP address.
The source port.
The ID of the destination resource.

The type of the destination resource. Valid values:

*   **ecs**: the ECS instance
*   **internetIp**: the public IP address
*   **vsw**: the vSwitch
*   **vpn**: the VPN gateway
*   **vbr**: the VBR
*   **clb**: the Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance
The destination IP address.
The destination port.

The protocol type. Valid values:

*   **tcp**: Transmission Control Protocol (TCP)
*   **udp**: User Datagram Protocol (UDP)
*   **icmp**: Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)
The description of the network path.
schema.example: Analyze the path from ECS to ECS

schema.description: The tags to add to the resource.

Key.description:
The key of tag N to add to the resource. The tag key can be up to 128 characters in length and cannot contain `http://` or `https://`. The tag key cannot start with `acs:` or `aliyun`.

You can add up to 20 tags in each call.

Value.description:
The value of tag N to add to the resource. You can specify up to 20 tag values. The tag value can be an empty string.

The tag value can be up to 128 characters in length and cannot contain `http://` or `https://`. The tag value cannot start with `aliyun` or `acs:`.

CreateNetworkPath.title: CreateNetworkPath
CreateNetworkPath.description:
*   You can call the **CreateNetworkPath** operation to create network paths in multiple networking scenarios and between multiple resources. After a path is created, the path parameters are saved for repeated analysis.
*   You can create up to 100 network paths within one Alibaba Cloud account.

CreateAndAnalyzeNetworkPath.title: CreateAndAnalyzeNetworkPath
CreateAndAnalyzeNetworkPath.description: You can call this operation to initiate a task for analyzing network reachability by specifying only the information about the source and destination. You do not need to create a network path for reachability analysis. The analysis result is not recorded in the system. If you want to record the path parameters and analysis result in the Network Intelligence Service (NIS) console, we recommend that you call the **createNetworkReachableAnalysis** operation.

GetNetworkReachableAnalysis.summary: Obtains the results of network reachability analysis.

schema.description: The ID of the region for which you want to obtain the result of network reachability analysis.
The ID of the task for analyzing network reachability. You can call the **CreateNetworkRearchableAnalysis** operation to obtain the ID of the task for analyzing network reachability.

NetworkReachableAnalysisId.description: The ID of the task for analyzing network reachability.

NetworkReachableAnalysisStatus.description:
The state of the task for analyzing network reachability. Valid values:

*   **init**: The task is in progress.
*   **finish**: The task is complete.
*   **error**: An analysis error occurred.
*   **timeout**: The task timed out.

NetworkReachableAnalysisResult.description: The result of network reachability analysis, which includes the network topology, error codes of network unreachability, and rules of network unreachability.

Reachable.description:
Indicates whether the network path is reachable. Valid values:

*   **true**: The network path is reachable.
*   **false**: The network path is unreachable.

CreateTime.description: The time when the network path was created. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.

AliUid.description: The unique ID (UID) of the Alibaba Cloud account.

NetworkPathParameter.description: The parameters of the network path.

GetNetworkReachableAnalysis.title: GetNetworkReachableAnalysis
GetNetworkReachableAnalysis.description:
**GetNetworkReachableAnalysis** is an asynchronous operation. After a request is sent, the system returns a request ID and runs the task in the background. You can query the state of the task for analyzing network reachability.

*   The **init** state indicates that the task is in progress.
*   The **finish** state indicates that the task is complete. In this state, you can obtain the analysis result.

schema.title:
按流量转发所使用的阿里云网络资源类型进行分析，已支持网络资源类型：
AccessInternetIPV4：所有阿里云公网类型IPV4
AccessInternetIPV4Limited：所有受地域限速的阿里云公网类型IPV4
ElasticIP: 弹性公网EIP（IPV4）
PublicIPEcs:  绑定在ECS的固定公网IP（IPV4）
PublicIPClb:  绑定在CLB的固定公网IP（IPV4）
NAT：通过SNAT的访问公网流量
TR：流经云企业网转发路由器的流量
TRAttachment：流经云企业网连接实例的流量，包括地域内连接和跨地域连接，地域内连接具备出入方向，跨地域连接仅具备出方向
VBR：流经边界路由器的流量
GA：流经全球加速的流量
ECR：流经ECR的流量
VPC：流经VPC的流量
InternetProbing: 公网探测数据
IntranetProbing: 内网探测数据

指标名。
流量分析场景支持的公共参数：
  bps：每秒比特数。
  pps：每秒包数。
公网场景特有参数：
  rtt：tcp协议建立连接时的往返延迟。
  RetransmitRate：重传率。
区域级带宽场景特有参数：
  RatelimitDropPps：限速丢包速率。
  BandwidthUtilization：带宽利用率。
NAT场景特有参数：
  ActiveSessionCount：并发会话数。
  NewSessionPerSecond：每秒新建会话数。
具体业务的Metric查询参数。各场景参数说明详见xxx部分。
起始时间戳，单位毫秒。未指定时默认查最近1小时。
结束时间戳，单位毫秒。未指定时默认查最近1小时。只指定了BeginTime时查BeginTime之后的一小时。

排序方式，
TimestampAscending：按时间正向排序。
TimestampDescending：按时间逆向排序。
是否使用多账号访问模式
